CHAPTER 236 Department of Finance

236.01Director of Finance; functions of department.

236.02Petty Cash Fund.

236.03Depository and investment procedures.

236.04Reserved.

236.05Waiver of prevailing wage laws.

236.06Cash fund for Income Tax Division.

236.07Service charges for bad checks.

236.08Reserved.

236.09DUI Enforcement and Education Fund.

236.10Springboro Police Department Forfeiture Proceeds Trust Fund.

CROSS REFERENCES

Independent audit - see CHTR. Sec. 4.11

Competitive bidding - see CHTR. Sec. 7.05

General provisions - see CHTR. Sec. Art. VIII

Fiscal year - see CHTR. Sec. 8.01

Receipt of fees - see CHTR. Sec. 12.03

Contracts - see CHTR. Sec. 606.17

Transfer of functions - see CHTR. Sec. 13.10

Finance Committee - see ADM. 220.01(Rule 11)
